name: According to Cain
description:
Two brothers.

One murder.

And a mystery as old as mankind.

You are a medieval investigator sent back to mankind's beginnings to learn the secrets behind the first act of murder. Using a novel alchemy system, observation, and your wits, you must discover the untold truth about Cain and Abel.

Includes a custom music soundtrack.

Winner of the Interactive Fiction Competition 2022 (6th place)
and the Miss Congeniality 2022 award (1st place)
